price: Kemudian, Kami tepati janji (yang telah Kami janjikan) kepada mereka.  Maka Kami selamatkan mereka dan orang-orang yang Kami kehendaki dan Kami binasakan orang-orang yang melampaui batas.
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
